rows.title: Handwashing
rows.text_introduction: Good hand hygiene stops the passing of germs from person to person or from person to food or water

rows.title: Safe Water Source
rows.text_introduction: Clean water saves money and improves health.  Making sure you collect water from a safe source is the start!

rows.title: Water Containers
rows.text_introduction: Keep strong with clean water.  Healthy homes have good water containers that are easy to use.

rows.title: Water Treatment
rows.text_introduction: Never assume water is safe to drink – always treat it.

rows.title: Clean Latrines
rows.text_introduction: A clean latrine means good hygiene. Good hygiene means diseases will not spread from a dirty latrine.

rows.title: Healthy Homes
rows.text_introduction: A clean healthy home makes everyone happy. Clean healthy homes reduce your family’s risk of exposure to bacteria and diseases. A clean house is also less inviting to pests.

rows.title: Healthy Families
rows.text_introduction: With a clean place to stay, you and your family members can avoid various diseases, and therefore be very happy.

rows.title: Menstrual Hygiene
rows.text_introduction: With good mentrual hygiene, girls can maintain their body hygiene and health. This gives them confidence and dignity. It also means that girls do not miss school during menstruation.

rows.title: Waste management
rows.text_introduction: Poor solid waste management could cause many problems including clogging of pipes and drainage systems and the creation of breeding sites for flies or insects which contribute to disease spread.

rows.title: Safe Food
rows.text_introduction:
Food can become contaminated with germs and bacteria during slaughtering, while harvesting from the filed, during storage and transportation, and also while cooking.

By following good food hygiene practices, we can prevent food from becoming contaminated and causing food poisoning. This ensures families eat safe and healthy meals. refers to the conditions and measures necessary to ensure the safety of food from the moment you are cooking it to when you eat it.

rows.title: Breastfeeding
rows.text_introduction: Breastfeeding is one of the most effective ways to ensure child health and survival. A safe, clean and healthy environment can help protect a mother and her child from many common childhood and maternal illnesses.

rows.title: Bathing Shelters
rows.text_introduction: A clean healthy bathing place is relaxing and comfortable to use. (Sometimes, you can even sing while bathing!!)
